name: Hello Virtual Mom 3D
description:
You are very excited for your vacations and want to make these vacations full of Fun. You have decided to play games, eat more yummy chocolates, watch your favorite TV shows and spend more time with your lovely pet dog.
Your mother wants you to study more in vacations and learn all your lessons. But you don’t want to study. You just want to enjoy and make fun. You need to sneak in the house and do different interesting activities. But Be careful . Stay away from Mom.
You want to play games in game room. Go to game room but don’t get caught. There is a chocolate cake in fridge. Go and grab it. You want to swim in pool. Go and sneak through study room’s window that opens at pool.
Time to make fun. But be careful as your mom has asked you to stay in study room and do your homework.
You’ll love its simulating activities. Let’s download and enjoy!

Features:
• Interesting activities!
• Addictive Gameplay!
• High Quality 3D Graphics!
• Amazing Sounds!
• Smooth and Easy Controls!
